name: Titanium.UI.NavigationWindow
summary: A NavigationWindow implements a specialized view that manages the navigation of hierarchical content.

methods.name: closeWindow
methods.summary: Closes a window and removes it from the navigation window.

parameters.name: options
parameters.summary: Options supporting a single animated boolean property to determine whether the window will be animated (default) while being closed (default: true).

methods.name: openWindow
methods.summary: Opens a window within the navigation window.

parameters.name: options
parameters.summary: Options supporting a single animated boolean property to determine whether the window will be animated (default) while being opened (default: true).

methods.name: popToRootWindow
methods.summary: Closes all windows that are currently opened inside the navigation window.
methods.description: Note that only the close event of the most recently opened window is fired.

parameters.name: options
parameters.summary: Options supporting a single animated boolean property to determine whether the windows will be animated while being closed (default: false).

properties.name: window
properties.summary: Window to add to this navigation window.
